plugins.name: Athlon TOC
plugins.description:
Navigate Your Figma Projects Like Never Before


A tool to streamline your design workflow. This powerful plugin automatically generates a detailed table of contents for your Figma files, making navigation through complex projects a breeze.


Features and Benefits:


Automatic Detection: The tool scans your Figma file and automatically identifies all sections and frames, organizing them into a clear, concise table of contents.


Clickable Links: Each entry in the table of contents is a clickable link, allowing you to jump directly to the relevant section or frame. No more scrolling through endless layers to find what you need!


Dynamic Updates: As your project evolves, rerunning the tool dynamically updates the table of contents to reflect changes, ensuring that you always have an up-to-date overview.


Vertical Auto-Layout: The table of contents is presented in a neatly organized vertical auto-layout frame, providing a clear and structured overview of your document.


Customizable Layout: While the tool takes care of the heavy lifting, you retain full control over the layout and presentation of your table of contents, ensuring it complements your design process.


Easy to Use:

Simply install the plugin, run it within your Figma file, and watch as it transforms your workflow, saving you time and effort.
plugins.tagline: Navigate with Ease: Instant Table of Contents for Your Figma Files

plugins.name: Colour Scale Generator
plugins.description:
Design smarter colour systems in seconds. This plugin lets you enter a HEX value and instantly creates a vertical stack of Tailwind-style shades (from 50–950) as Figma rectangles. Ideal for UI designers building design systems, checking contrast, or quickly visualising accessible palettes — powered by Chroma.js logic, all inside Figma.

Created by Salo Creative.

accepted.name: Carl Cahill
accepted.description: UX/UI Designer, Creative Director and Agency Founder

plugins.tagline: Generate accessible, Tailwind-style colour scales directly in Figma — just enter a HEX code.

129594.name: Colour Scale Generator
129594.description:

Ideal for UI designers building design systems, checking contrast, or quickly visualising accessible palettes — powered by Chroma.js logic, all inside Figma.

Created by Salo Creative.
129594.release_notes: Added colour picker and a few UI updates.
129594.tagline: Generate accessible, Tailwind-style colour scales directly in Figma — just enter a HEX code.

plugins.name: Dynamo
plugins.description:
Effortlessly increase design quality and accessibility


  1. Live preview Dynamic Type in real time
  2. Spot where text needs to wrap or truncate
  3. Add your scaled designs to the canvas with a click
  4. Saves you a ton of time


What's Dynamic Type?


Many users set a text size other than the default in order to read content more comfortably. Supporting Dynamic Type and larger text sizes is an important accessibility requirement. Dynamo scales text layers in your designs to test how they handle larger text sizes. Making it much easier to increase the quality, robustness, and inclusivity of your designs.


For best results


  1. Use auto layout in your designs so that layouts remain in tact once text layers have scaled
  2. To ignore a text layer, prepend its name with a period


Please leave comments and feedback below.

accepted.name: Mike
accepted.description:
Premium app design for startups.
Tools to level up designers.

plugins.tagline: Live Dynamic Type Preview

plugins.name: Figma to Celtra
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with the "Figma to Celtra" integration! Effortlessly import your stunning Figma designs into Celtra's design workspace and unlock the power of creative automation.


Key Features:

  1. Streamlined Workflow: Continue your pre-production processes and create conceptual designs in Figma, then drop them into Celtra with ease for a cohesive and efficient design experience.
  2. Efficient Importing: Easily transition your designs from Figma to Celtra using a simple copy and paste function. Whether you're working with single layers or multiple artboards, the process is quick and hassle-free.
  3. Layer Mapping: Experience seamless compatibility as all layer types from Figma are mapped to their corresponding layers in Celtra. Make configurations effortlessly for Images, Text, Shapes, and Groups right after you import.


Once your designs are in Celtra, take advantage of creative automation to scale your content across various sizes and design variations without missing a beat. Upgrade your design collaboration and scaling capabilities today by using "Figma to Celtra", and take the first step toward a more streamlined creative workflow.


Note that this plugin is compatible only with design files created in Celtra's Creative Automation platform.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Design Integration

  3. Layer Mapping: Experience seamless compatibility as all layer types from Figma are mapped to their corresponding layers in Celtra. Make configurations effortlessly for Images, Text, Shapes, and Groups right after you import.

Upgrade your design collaboration and scaling capabilities today by using "Figma to Celtra", and take the first step toward a more streamlined creative workflow.


Note that this plugin is compatible only with design files created in Celtra's Creative Automation platform.

plugins.name: Contrast Checker
plugins.description:
Evaluate the contrast in your UI design according to the Contrast Success Criteria 1.4.3 and 1.4.6 of the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG).


Key Features:

  1. Instant Contrast Analysis: Quickly verify the contrast ratio between any text or element and its background for web accessibility.
  2. Accessibility Compliance: Ensure your designs are accessible to all users by meeting WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) standards.
  3. Intuitive Interface: Designed for simplicity and efficiency, providing a seamless workflow.


Why Choose Finlayer AI's Contrast Checker?

  1. Completely Free: No cost, perfect for freelancers, agencies, and in-house teams alike.
  2. Enhances Accessibility: Helps you design inclusive, ADA-compliant experiences for all users.
plugins.tagline: Turn high-quality designs into engaging and user-centric mobile experiences

plugins.name: Set Min/Max size
plugins.description:
This plugin is designed to manage and modify the sizing constraints of selected elements within auto layout frames or elements that are themselves auto layout frames.


Functionality:

  1. Setting min/max width or height
  2. Setting both min and max width or height simultaneously
  3. Setting all dimensions (min/max width and height)
  4. Removing min/max width or height constraints
  5. Removing all constraints
plugins.tagline: Instantly set min & max dimensions to multiple items

94912.name: Set Min/Max size
94912.description:
This plugin is designed to manage and modify the sizing constraints of selected elements within auto layout frames or elements that are themselves auto layout frames.


Functionality:

  1. Setting min/max width or height
  2. Setting both min and max width or height simultaneously
  3. Setting all dimensions (min/max width and height)
  4. Removing min/max width or height constraints
  5. Removing all constraints
94912.tagline: Instantly set min & max dimensions to multiple items

plugins.name: x10 figma command line
plugins.description:
This plugin builds on top of Figma's native command line. Allowing you to conditionally select layers with in a page, Filter current selections through conditions, and set the properties of the current select layers.


x10 is designed to avoid having to learn a new command line language as much as possible. It uses natural way setting conditions and setting properties.



For documentation, Feature request or bug reports use my notion page!


Link to documentation

accepted.name: Brian alfaro
accepted.description:
Design lead for @washingtonpost design system.

Designer | Developer | Entrepreneur.

plugins.tagline: Extends figma command line capabilities.

plugins.name: Custom Table Generator
plugins.description:
Custom Table Generator is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you design complex, fully customizable tables—without importing JSON, CSV, or any external data.


Designed for designers who demand precision and flexibility, this plugin gives you a smooth UI for building table structures from scratch, component by component.


Key features:

🧱 Component-friendly: build using Figma components, variants, and auto layout


🔧 Drag-and-drop column and row control


🎨 Full styling options: borders, spacing, colors, typography, alignment


📐 Advanced layout support (nested cells, merged rows, sticky headers, etc.)
plugins.tagline: Build complex, beautiful tables—without touching code or data files.

plugins.name: FillGPT
plugins.description:
FillGPT is an AI-powered Figma plugin designed to improve workflow efficiency by automating content generation, text optimization, and design analysis. It helps designers, copywriters, and product teams enhance UI copy, rename layers, and analyze design best practices.


Key features:


- Smart layer renaming to keep files organized

- AI-generated content for UI elements and marketing copy

- Copy enhancement, including expanding, shortening, and rephrasing text

- Tone and style adjustment to match different contexts

- Design analysis to improve clarity, accessibility, and readability

- Grammar and spelling error detection and correction

- Text summarization and expansion for better content flow


FillGPT streamlines the design process, ensuring high-quality text and a more efficient workflow within Figma.
plugins.tagline: Use ChatGPT and Gemini in figma

125444.description:

125444.tagline: Use ChatGPT and Gemini in figma

plugins.name: Clean Gradients
plugins.description:
Problem:

When using a standard gradient with two colors, if there is a large gap between their tones, the saturation in the middle decreases significantly, and the color in this area may appear grayish-resulting in a «muddy» shade.


Solution:

With just two clicks, the plugin eliminates the «muddy» effect in the middle of the gradient by adding three additional intermediate color stops.


How to use the plugin:

1. The colors for the initial gradient can be taken either from an existing gradient element by selecting it and clicking the «Pick gradient» button or by using the «Color Picker» tool on the left and right of the button.

2. To apply the gradient, select the desired element and click the «Apply gradient» button.
plugins.tagline: Cleans the gradient from «dirt»

121505.name: Clean Gradients
121505.description:
Problem:

When using a standard gradient with two colors, if there is a large gap between their tones, the saturation in the middle decreases significantly, and the color in this area may appear grayish-resulting in a «muddy» shade.


Solution:

With just two clicks, the plugin eliminates the «muddy» effect in the middle of the gradient by adding three additional intermediate color stops.


How to use the plugin:

1. The colors for the initial gradient can be taken either from an existing gradient element by selecting it and clicking the «Pick gradient» button or by using the «Color Picker» tool on the left and right of the button.

2. To apply the gradient, select the desired element and click the «Apply gradient» button.

plugins.name: Atomic Design Components
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with our AI-powered component generator. Simply describe what you want in natural language, and watch as professional, consistent UI components come to life instantly.


Key Features:

• Generate complete UI components using simple text prompts

• Built on atomic design principles for maximum reusability

• Support for buttons, forms, inputs, navigation, and more

• Customizable colors, sizes, states, and properties

• Responsive and design system ready

• Premium features including unlimited generations


Perfect for design teams, UI/UX designers, and anyone building professional interfaces. Start with our free trial and generate up to 20 components!


Contact & Support:


GitHub Issues: Report bugs or request features on GitHub.


Email Support: Reach out directly at alexanderburgosuk82@gmail.com.

plugins.name: X-ray UI
plugins.description: Counts the number of screens, input fields and buttons in a user journey, given a selection of multiple frames. Matches the UI elements by a specific naming convention that can be customized, more components can be added as well such as radio buttons, checkboxes and textareas.
plugins.tagline: Count the number of screens, input fields and buttons

plugins.name: Obra Icons
plugins.description:
The Obra Icons plugin features:


  1. 1000+ icons: this set has an icon for everything you need. We specifically chose the icons to work well in user interfaces.
  2. 3 weights: every icon can be added to your designs in 3 different weights, with stroke widths of 2px, 1.5px and 1px
  3. Sizes: Set your icons in different sizes, from the smallest size at 12 by 12 pixels to 64 by 64 pixels.
  4. Change colours: Ability to change the color of pasted icons, even to save your own custom colors to the plugin
  5. Keyword search: search icons not just by their name, but also by extensive extra keywords, to make it easier to find what you are looking for


View all Obra icons on the web via our website icons.obra.studio.

accepted.name: Obra Studio
accepted.description: Obra Studio helps software companies get to the next design level

plugins.tagline: The official Obra Icons Figma plugin

plugins.name: Knapsack
plugins.description:
Export Figma Vars in a format that can be imported into a Knapsack Workspace as Design Tokens and CSS. Collections & Modes are preserved and allow many theming possibilities in your design system's coded components.


  1. An existing Knapsack workspace is required
  2. Currently only export from Figma Vars to Knapsack Design Tokens is supported - with the other direction coming in a future update


For support, reach out to help at knapsack dot cloud

accepted.name: Knapsack
accepted.description: Knapsack is an enterprise-grade design system platform connecting design and code for teams of every size.

plugins.tagline: Synchronize Figma Vars with coded Design Tokens in Knapsack

plugins.name: deeepSpace
plugins.description:
deeepSpace Plugin (Beta) – Bring Your Design System to Life 🚀


Transform your design systems into scalable, production-ready code with the deeepSpace Figma Plugin (Beta). Designed for creators and builders who prioritize scalability, efficiency, and speed, deeepSpace makes it effortless to bridge the gap between design and development without unnecessary complexity.


What Makes deeepSpace Awesome?


🚀 Unmatched Speed: Push your design system to deeepSpace in just seconds. It’s so fast, you’ll wonder how you worked without it!


💡 Design-System-First: Forget bulky page-level exports. We focus exclusively on your design system to ensure your components are scalable, reusable, and developer-ready.


🛠️ Developer-Centric Code: No messy, bloated output – just clean, structured code that your dev team will love. Minimal edits required!


📦 Complete Workflow Integration: From the Figma Plugin to the deeepCLI and web interface, our tools work together seamlessly to keep your projects and design systems organized.


Beta Features:


This is our beta version, and we’re constantly improving! Try it now and help us shape the future of design-to-code workflows. Your feedback will directly influence the next steps of deeepSpace’s evolution.


How It Works:


1.Design your system in Figma.

2.Use the suuuuper fast deeepSpace Plugin (Beta) to push it to your workspace.

3.Generate and pull production-ready code with the deeepCLI.


Effortlessly manage your design system and projects through the deeepSpace web interface. Collaborate, track progress, and keep everything organized in one place.


Join our beta and help build scalable products faster than ever with deeepSpace! 🎉
plugins.tagline: “deeepSpace Figma Plugin – Supercharge Your Design System to Code Workflow, Faster Than Ever! 🚀”

Support for plugin is provided at we@eduhund.com

plugins.name: Stash Modes
plugins.description: This plugin enables you to "stash" variable modes within your Figma file. A stashed mode is essentially a copy of an existing mode. Although it is not directly accessible for pages and frames, you can later swap it back as a "real" mode. This feature proves handy when you want to experiment with different settings while preserving your original modes.
plugins.tagline: Save variable modes for later

78580.name: Stash Modes
78580.description: This plugin enables you to "stash" variable modes within your Figma file. A stashed mode is essentially a copy of an existing mode. Although it is not directly accessible for pages and frames, you can later swap it back as a "real" mode. This feature proves handy when you want to experiment with different settings while preserving your original modes.
78580.release_notes: Cosmetic changes and Bugfixes. After the Update it might be necessary to click reload once to see the stashed modes.

plugins.name: FontLang Switcher
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma designs with ease! This plugin combines three essential features into one convenient tool:


🌐 Translate Text – Instantly translate your design’s text content into various languages. Ideal for multilingual design projects.


🔤 Replace Fonts – Quickly swap fonts across your designs, making global typography updates a breeze.


🔄 Mirror Elements – Flip or mirror design elements horizontally for right-to-left (RTL) support or layout variations.


Why you’ll love this plugin:

✅ Save time on manual updates

✅ Enhance global design workflows

✅ Streamline font management and layout adjustments

Perfect for designers working on international products, multilingual interfaces, and adaptable layouts.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Text Translation, Font Replacement & Mirroring – All in One Plugin

plugins.name: Logify
plugins.description:
Logify — Version Tracking for Design Systems


Keep your design system consistent — and versioned. This plugin helps you track changes to local styles and components in your Figma file, presenting differences in a clean, structured changelog directly on the canvas.


No need to log edits manually — Logify detects added, modified, and removed elements automatically.


What you can do:

  1. Compare current and previous file states
  2. Generate visual changelogs inside your file
  3. Group updates by Added / Changed / Removed
  4. Document design system evolution clearly

accepted.name: Pavel Grachev
accepted.description: Product designer. Focused on clarity, usability, and quality design systems.

plugins.tagline: Effortless changelog for your design system

plugins.name: StyleSnap - Create AI Icons in Any Style
plugins.description:
Effortlessly create custom icons in any style with StyleSnap – the smart Figma plugin that brings AI-powered icon generation right where you work.


Whether you're designing a sleek UI or crafting a detailed illustration, StyleSnap lets you instantly replicate any icon style and generate new icons in seconds – all royalty-free and within Figma.


Perfect for designers who love consistency, speed, and creativity.


🎯 Right-Click Style Capture: Instantly capture the style of any icon in your Figma file with a simple right-click.


🖌️ AI-Powered Icon Generation: Describe the icon you want, and StyleSnap will create it to match the style you selected – from minimal to highly illustrative.


♾️ Style Agnostic: Works with any style – flat, outlined, detailed, 3D-inspired, or even hand-drawn.


🎨 Perfect for UI & Illustrations: Whether you're building out a clean interface or adding a creative touch, StyleSnap generates icons that feel perfectly on-brand.


🔓 Royalty-Free Icons: All generated icons are yours to use freely, with no licensing worries.


⚡ No Asset Library Needed: Skip the endless searches. Just pick a style, describe your icon, and go.


👨‍🎨 Great for Teams & Solo Designers: Maintain design consistency across projects without extra effort or asset juggling.


How to use the plugin?

  1. Install StyleSnap from the Figma Community.
  2. Right-click on any icon.
  3. Describe the new icon you need.
  4. Let the plugin generate it for you – in the exact style, ready to use and royalty-free.
plugins.tagline: Easily copy any icon style to create new icons in a snap

The layer counts are broken down by page. It'll also count the number of layers in your selection. It doesn't do anything else.

plugins.name: Swap remote to local instances and variables - Lazy Swap
plugins.description:
1. Swap remote instances to local instances.
  2. Select pages containing components for quick scanning.
  3. Select the necessary local components for quick swapping.
  4. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote instances are fully converted to local instances.
  5. Swap remote variables to local variables.
  6. Select the types you want to swap.
  7. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote variables are fully converted to local variables.

Easy and fast conversion. Free for you.
plugins.tagline: Swap remote instances to local instances and remote variables to local variables, easy and fast.

129143.name: Swap remote to local instances and variables - Lazy Swap
129143.description:
1. Swap remote instances to local instances.

  3. Select the necessary local components for quick swapping.
  4. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote instances are fully converted to local instances.
  5. Swap remote variables to local variables.
  6. Select the types you want to swap.
  7. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote variables are fully converted to local variables.

Easy and fast conversion. Free for you.
129143.tagline: Swap remote instances to local instances and remote variables to local variables, easy and fast.

plugins.name: Figmentor – Export Figma to Elementor Instantly
plugins.description:
Figmentor is the ultimate plugin to export your Figma designs directly into Elementor (WordPress) in seconds.


Whether you're a designer, developer, freelancer, or agency, Figmentor saves hours of manual work by turning any Figma frame into a ready-to-use Elementor JSON file pixel-perfect, responsive, and style-preserved.


🎯 Key Features


🔁 One-click Figma to Elementor export


🖼️ Pixel-perfect layout preservation


🎨 Exports text, shapes, images, colors & styles


🤖 AI enhancements (soon) for smarter design output


💼 Built for freelancers, studios & WordPress pros


🔒 Safe, secure access with your personal token


🛠️ Perfect for:

Web designers, WordPress developers, design studios, marketers, no-code builders, and product teams using Figma + Elementor.


🚀 Say goodbye to rebuilding designs from scratch. With Figmentor, what you design is what you ship.
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma designs to Elementor templates with 1 click. Pixel-perfect export, no coding needed.

plugins.name: A11y Helper - Test for Accessibility
plugins.description:
This plugin aims to help UX/UI designers integrate accessibility awareness and thoughtful design throughout their workflows.


Test elements of your design with integrated colour-blindness simulation, contrast, text size, hierarchy and ALT-text checkers.


I'll be adding to the plugin over the next few months, with features such as,

  1. Automated fixes such as quick text colour adjustment to meet contrast requirements, and colour suggestions
  2. Batch processing & (hopefully) accessibility report generation
plugins.tagline: Make accessibility a priority at every step.

127447.description:

Test elements of your design with integrated colour-blindness simulation, contrast, text size, hierarchy and ALT-text checkers.


I'll be adding to the plugin over the next few months, with features such as,

plugins.name: Export SVG to Power BI by ventriloc
plugins.description: Export SVG to Power BI by ventriloc streamlines the process of integrating custom SVG's visuals into Power BI. Instead of manually recreating designs, simply export your Figma frame as an SVG, paste it into a Power BI measure, and tweak the code to incorporate dynamic elements like measures and variables. This tool is perfect for designers and analysts who want full creative control over their Power BI visuals without the hassle of complex coding. Want to see more of what ventriloc can do? Visit our website ventriloc.ca !
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly export Figma frames to Power BI as editable SVGs for dynamic, custom visuals.

plugins.name: Autolayout converter Helper
plugins.description:
Effortlessly locate frames and take control of your design exploration!!!


Navigate to complex Figma layers with ease! This plugin helps you traverse design hierarchies by stopping at frames and allowing you to decide the next move. Customize your search—pause anywhere and pick it up whenever you're ready (at that moment perform your change at layer✨ ). Perfect for designers and developers who need precise, targeted frame navigation.


Key Features :

  1. Start Search from Any Node : Begin traversal from any selected layer in your Figma file, drilling down through layers and frames.
  2. Stop on Frame Detection : Pauses at each frame, allowing you to review, edit, or proceed to the next frame.
  3. Customisable Navigation : Choose from Next to continue, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause as needed.


Use Cases :

  1. Designers and Developers : Streamline work on large, complex Figma files with multiple frames and layers.
  2. Efficient Frame Location : Locate frames quickly, without tedious manual scrolling.
  3. Auto Layout Validation : Essential for platforms or projects requiring strict auto layout adherence for accurate design and responsive outputs. This plugin helps ensure each frame aligns to the full auto layout setup, ensuring optimal structure and consistency.
  4. Flexible Layer Exploration : Customize your traversal to focus on only the layers that matter most for faster design reviews and targeted edits.


How to Use :

  1. Select your starting node in Figma, click Start, and let the plugin begin searching.
  2. When a layer is detected, choose Next to proceed, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause where desired.


Boost productivity, stay organized, and manage complex Figma designs with this efficient layers finding plugin. Ideal for design reviews, auto layout validation, focused edits, and streamlined development workflows!
plugins.tagline: Navigate layers with ease: control traversal and reduce your manual drilling time by 40%

plugins.name: GPT To I18n
plugins.description:
GptToI18n是一款非常实用的插件工具！它不仅能够轻松地的一键生成i18n，还可以将设计稿瞬间转化为多种语言版本，让您轻松应对全球市场。




一键生成i18n json。这意味着您可以在不需要编写任何代码的情况下，自动将设计稿翻译成其他语言。这不仅可以节省您的时间和精力，还能提高工作效率。




我们推荐在草稿状态下完成，您只需要按住 ctrl + p 打开GptToI18n插件，选择您需要转换的范围和目标语言，然后点击获取JSON，只需要等待几秒就能完成 i18n JSON生成。可以看到的 Text name 也做了对应处理。




如果您需要将设计稿转换成目标语言版本，您只需要点击根据 JSON 翻译页面即可。




一键将设计稿转化为各种语言的版本。无论您的客户在世界的哪个角落，他们只需要打开您的设计稿，就可以立即理解您的产品。




当然，如果您没有输入OpenAi API 密钥，获取对应 JSON 需要消耗 tokens ，如果您有自己的OpenAi API 密钥，那么您可以尽情的使用。




所以，如果您是一个善于尝试新工具的人，那么GptToi18n绝对是一个不容错过的好选择。它不仅可以帮助您节省时间和精力，提高工作效率，还可以让您的产品更轻松地走进全球市场。快来试试吧，让它为您的工作带来更多的便利和成功！


GptToI18n is a very useful plugin tool! Not only can it easily generate i18n with one click, but it can also instantly convert designs into multiple language versions, so that you can easily respond to the global market.


Generate i18n json in one click. This means that you can automatically translate your designs into other languages without having to write any code. This will not only save you time and effort, but also improve your productivity.


We recommend that you finish in draft state, you just need to hold down ctrl + p to open the GptToI18n plugin, select the scope and target language you want to convert, and then click Get JSON, only need to wait a few seconds to complete the i18n JSON generation. The Text name that can be seen is also processed.


If you need to convert your design to the target language version, just click Translate Page from JSON.


Convert design drafts into various languages with one click. No matter where your customers are in the world, they just need to open your design manuscript and instantly understand your product.


Of course, if you do not enter the OpenAi API key, it will cost tokens to get the corresponding JSON, and if you have your own OpenAi API key, then you can use it as much as you like.


So, if you are someone who is good at trying out new tools, then GptToi18n is definitely a good choice not to be missed. It can not only help you save time and effort, improve work efficiency, but also make it easier for your products to enter the global market. Give it a try and let it bring more convenience and success to your work!


GptToI18n是一款非常实用的插件工具！它不仅能够轻松地的一键生成i18n，还可以将设计稿瞬间转化为多种语言版本，让您轻松应对全球市场。


一键生成i18n json。这意味着您可以在不需要编写任何代码的情况下，自动将设计稿翻译成其他语言。这不仅可以节省您的时间和精力，还能提高工作效率。


我们推荐在草稿状态下完成，您只需要按住 ctrl + p 打开GptToI18n插件，选择您需要转换的范围和目标语言，然后点击获取JSON，只需要等待几秒就能完成 i18n JSON生成。可以看到的 Text name 也做了对应处理。


如果您需要将设计稿转换成目标语言版本，您只需要点击根据 JSON 翻译页面即可。


一键将设计稿转化为各种语言的版本。无论您的客户在世界的哪个角落，他们只需要打开您的设计稿，就可以立即理解您的产品。


当然，如果您没有输入OpenAi API 密钥，获取对应 JSON 需要消耗 tokens ，如果您有自己的OpenAi API 密钥，那么您可以尽情的使用。


所以，如果您是一个善于尝试新工具的人，那么GptToi18n绝对是一个不容错过的好选择。它不仅可以帮助您节省时间和精力，提高工作效率，还可以让您的产品更轻松地走进全球市场。快来试试吧，让它为您的工作带来更多的便利和成功！

GptToI18n is a very useful plugin tool! Not only can it easily generate i18n with one click, but it can also instantly convert designs into multiple language versions, so that you can easily respond to the global market.


Generate i18n json in one click. This means that you can automatically translate your designs into other languages without having to write any code. This will not only save you time and effort, but also improve your productivity.


We recommend that you finish in draft state, you just need to hold down ctrl + p to open the GptToI18n plugin, select the scope and target language you want to convert, and then click Get JSON, only need to wait a few seconds to complete the i18n JSON generation. The Text name that can be seen is also processed.


If you need to convert your design to the target language version, just click Translate Page from JSON.


Convert design drafts into various languages with one click. No matter where your customers are in the world, they just need to open your design manuscript and instantly understand your product.


Of course, if you do not enter the OpenAi API key, it will cost tokens to get the corresponding JSON, and if you have your own OpenAi API key, then you can use it as much as you like.


So, if you are someone who is good at trying out new tools, then GptToi18n is definitely a good choice not to be missed. It can not only help you save time and effort, improve work efficiency, but also make it easier for your products to enter the global market. Give it a try and let it bring more convenience and success to your work!

plugins.name: Brandquad
plugins.description:
Connect to your Brandquad Product Information Management (PIM) system from Figma.


Search, preview, and import files and product data directly from your PIM catalog within Figma.


If you don't have a Brandquad PIM account yet, please visit https://brandquad.com/.

plugins.name: Collect Instances
plugins.description: The plugin generates a page that lists all instance duplications on the current page. If run with a selection, it duplicates instances within that selection and any instances from the same components.
plugins.tagline: The plugin collects all instances on the current page

plugins.name: HYWD Style Unifier
plugins.description:
Unify style parameters throughout your figma layout for better design consistency. Convert your intuitively designed first layouts into propper yet highly effective design systems. Or just fix your final design with your existing styles. Find inconsistencies or unlinked elements easily. Swap themes or incorporate external components and adapt them to your local or global styles in a breeze.


Here is a quick intro video on what the plugin can do for you!


And here are video-tutorials on the 3 main use cases:


Best workflow for design system building


Best workflow for design linting


Best workflow for style matching



Get even more details on how to use the tool and a FREE trial license at our HAYWOOD Digital Tools online shop and the figma style unifier plugin product page!

plugins.name: Samenamer
plugins.description: This Figma plugin allows you to select and color all frames on the current page that share the same name as the frame you have currently selected. After selecting a frame, the plugin will scan the page for other frames with the same name and select them automatically. The selected frames will then be colored red to make them stand out. This can be useful for quickly identifying and grouping related design elements within a Figma file.
plugins.tagline: same name frame similar names mark same frames

50442.name: Samenamer
50442.description: This Figma plugin allows you to select and color all frames on the current page that share the same name as the frame you have currently selected. After selecting a frame, the plugin will scan the page for other frames with the same name and select them automatically. The selected frames will then be colored red to make them stand out. This can be useful for quickly identifying and grouping related design elements within a Figma file.
50442.tagline: same name frame similar names mark same frames

plugins.name: FigJam Export to Markdown or JSON
plugins.description:
Turn sticky-note chaos into structured documentation.


This plugin reads your FigJam board, detects heading hierarchies by the number of ⭐ star stamps on each card, and exports a clean outline – perfect for journey-maps, service blueprints, research affinity walls or any workshop board that needs to become a report.


What you get

• Markdown or JSON with true heading levels (H1 / H2 / …).

• Bullet lists for every sticky-note or text card.

• Embedded screenshots and photos – automatically resized, placed under the right heading and zipped into an assets/ folder.

• One-click download; whole page or just the frames you select.


How it works

1 Structure top-down

Place headings above their content; the heading’s width defines the column below it.

2 Stamp to mark hierarchy

3 identical stars = H1, 2 stars = H2, 1 or 0 = regular content.

(Stars sitting on an image are ignored.)

3 Click “Download MD” or “Download JSON”

Text-only boards produce a single file; boards with images are delivered as a ready-to-share .zip.


Stop rebuilding journey maps slide-by-slide. Export once, drop the Markdown into Notion, Confluence or GitHub – or feed the JSON into your own reporting pipeline.
plugins.tagline: From FigJam to finished journey-map reports in one click – stamp, export, done.

plugins.name: Project Time Tracker
plugins.description:
Effortlessly track and manage your work hours directly in Figma. Project Time Tracker helps designers to monitor time spent on projects, improve productivity, and gain insights.


Key Features:

✅ Start & Stop Timer – Easily log work sessions with a simple click.

✅ Detailed Reports – View summaries to analyze time distribution.

✅ User-Friendly Interface – No setup, seamless integration.


🔹 Perfect for freelancers looking to optimize their design process.

👉 Install now and take control of your time!


❤️ Share your feedback:

https://forms.gle/UH5xyZkbMz2mwSxx9
plugins.tagline: Easily track your project time

plugins.name: Table Math
plugins.description:
Add, subtract, multiply, divide.

  2. Minimize this plugin (keep it running)
  3. Your table will update as you type
